item.description:
Cambridge Common is hosting a Harpoon Brewery Dinner!

Your ticket includes a welcome beer and four courses of brews and food.
Tickets ($39 w/o tax or gratuity) are on sale now! Ticket Info

Check out the brew and grub menu:

Premeal Beer: Harpoon Summer

~Starter~
Shrimp HopTail
Paired with Leviathan Imperial IPA

~Salad~
Classic Caesar with Homemade Foccacia Bread Croutons
Paired with UFO Hefeweizen

~Entree~[choice of]
Belgian White Orange Glazed Half Roasted Chicken with Grilled Asparagus & Roasted Herbed Potatoes
Paired with UFO White Ale

OR

Blackened Pork Medallions topped with a Cajun Butter, served with Sour Cream & Chive Smashed Potatoes
and Spicy Corn & Red Pepper
Paired with Harpoon IPA

~Dessert~
Raspberry Chocolate Shortcake
Paired with UFO Raspberry

NOTE: No one under 21 years old will be admitted.

Notes
All beers are will be 10 ounces, or less, depending on alcohol by volume
item.name: FYI: Harpoon Brewing Company Beer Dinner
